panels.tableColumn:
((SELECT offset FROM liquidity_analytics.tag_offsets WHERE tag = "zone-event" ORDER BY offset DESC LIMIT 1)
  /
  (SELECT ordering FROM liquidity_journal.journal ORDER BY ordering DESC LIMIT 1))
  * 100

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  ((SELECT offset FROM liquidity_analytics.tag_offsets WHERE tag = "zone-event" ORDER BY offset DESC LIMIT 1)
  /
  (SELECT ordering FROM liquidity_journal.journal ORDER BY ordering DESC LIMIT 1))
  * 100;

panels.title: Liveness

targets.rawSql:
SELECT zone_id AS "Zone ID",
  session_id AS "Session ID",
  remote_address AS "Remote address",
  actor_ref AS "Actor ref",
  fingerprint AS "Fingerprint",
  joined as "Joined"
  FROM client_sessions
  WHERE quit IS NULL
  ORDER BY joined DESC;

SELECT offset
  FROM liquidity_analytics.tag_offsets
  WHERE tag = "zone-event"
  ORDER BY offset DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT LEFT(zone_name_change.name, 20) AS "Name",
  zone.metadata->>'$.currency' AS "Currency",
  zone.zone_id AS "ID", zone.created AS "Created", zone.modified AS "Modified"
  FROM zones AS zone
  JOIN zone_name_changes AS zone_name_change
  ON zone_name_change.change_id = (
    SELECT change_id
      FROM zone_name_changes
      WHERE zone_id = zone.zone_id
      ORDER BY change_id DESC LIMIT 1
  )
  WHERE zone.zone_id IN (SELECT zone_id FROM client_sessions WHERE quit IS NULL)
  ORDER BY modified DESC;

SELECT $__timeGroup(created, $histogramWidth) AS time,
  SUM(1) AS value,
  (SELECT "Devices") AS metric
FROM devices
WHERE $__timeFilter(created)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY created ASC

SELECT $__timeGroup(entity.joined, $histogramWidth) AS time,
  SUM(1) AS value,
  (SELECT "Connections") AS metric
FROM client_sessions AS entity
JOIN zones AS zone
ON zone.zone_id = entity.zone_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(entity.joined) OR $__timeFilter(entity.quit)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY entity.joined ASC

SELECT $__timeGroup(created, $histogramWidth) AS time,
  SUM(1) AS value,
  (SELECT "Zones") AS metric
FROM zones
WHERE $__timeFilter(created)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY created ASC

SELECT $__timeGroup(entity.created, $histogramWidth) AS time,
  SUM(1) AS value,
  (SELECT "Members") AS metric
FROM members AS entity
JOIN zones AS zone
ON zone.zone_id = entity.zone_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(entity.created)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY entity.created ASC

SELECT $__timeGroup(entity.created, $histogramWidth) AS time,
  SUM(1) AS value,
  (SELECT "Accounts") AS metric
FROM accounts AS entity
JOIN zones AS zone
ON zone.zone_id = entity.zone_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(entity.created)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY entity.created ASC

SELECT $__timeGroup(entity.created, $histogramWidth) AS time,
  SUM(1) AS value,
  (SELECT "Transactions") AS metric
FROM transactions AS entity
JOIN zones AS zone
ON zone.zone_id = entity.zone_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(entity.created)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY entity.created ASC

SELECT LEFT(zone_name_change.name, 20) AS "Name",
  zone.metadata->>'$.currency' AS "Currency",
  zone.zone_id AS "ID", zone.created AS "Created", zone.modified AS "Modified"
  FROM zones AS zone
  JOIN zone_name_changes AS zone_name_change
  ON zone_name_change.change_id = (
    SELECT change_id
      FROM zone_name_changes
      WHERE zone_id = zone.zone_id
      ORDER BY change_id DESC LIMIT 1
  )
  WHERE (zone.created >= $__timeFrom() OR zone.modified >= $__timeFrom())
  ORDER BY modified DESC;
